Follow these instructions:

Find a channel with the smallest number of messages, and add all users who are not already in the channel to that channel

To solve this task, I need to first get the list of channels in the Slack workspace. Then, for each channel, I will read its messages and count them. After that, I will identify the channel with the smallest number of messages. Once I have identified the channel, I will get the list of users in the workspace and add them to the channel if they are not already there.

First, I will get the list of channels.

- general
- random
- private
